title: Incident Management procedures
content:
When Service Desk personnel can't resolve a customer incident in time, they can escalate the incident. Service Desk personnel can also create and resolve an incident directly when they know what the solution is.

Related topics

  • How to create an incident record
  • How to edit an incident record
  • How to relate incident records
  • How to create a record from an incident
  • How to create a record from a problem
  • How to create a record from a request
  • How to relate change records
